name: Escape The Sun!
description:
Made as a submission to the Pacifist Game Jam by HonestDan.

Inspired by true events, you have to navigate a small map on a particularly hot day whilst avoiding direct exposure to sunlight in order to keep your energy bar on an acceptable level (in other words: do not pass out under any circumstances).

Unfortunately, all we managed to finish is the first level, but we think base mechanics are more important to polish than having an infinite amount of barely playable levels. 

Also, due to a small bug the game volume can only be changed within the executable version down below.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Esc to open the menu
  • Side note: those convenient blue barrels are movable *and* provide shade!

~123654, Elidd
